scripts.build: webpack --mode production && cp $(tinygo env TINYGOROOT)/targets/wasm_exec.js docs/wasm_exec.js && GOPATH=$(pwd) tinygo build -o docs/silicon8.wasm -target wasm silicon8/wasm
scripts.build:debug: tinygo build -tags debug -o docs/silicon8.wasm -target wasm silicon8/wasm
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run run
